overview: Danny Mullen and his crew spend 24 hours in Compton in this eye opening documentary. It showcases American culture at its most raw, while also being funny and entertaining.
tagline: Disclaimer: I'm a comedian and this is all satire. None of this content is intended to be hurtful, and all jokes and scenarios are intended to be purely comedic.
title: 24 Hours Homeless in Compton!
